pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Dian4 ying3 Xue2 yuan4

definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Had graduated from Beijing film academy in America for study after fine.
sentences.chinese: 曾毕业于北京电影学院美术系，后赴美国进修。

sentences.english: Later, he entered the Beijing Film Academy.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他考上了北京电影学院。

sentences.english: It is organized by the Directing Department of BFA.
sentences.chinese: 它的主办者是北京电影学院导演系。

sentences.english: Six months later entered the Beijing Film Academy in examinations.
sentences.chinese: 半年以后考试进入北京电影学院表演系。

sentences.english: Art Institute of Beijing Film Academy test must be digital SLR camera?
sentences.chinese: 北京电影学院摄影学院艺考必须用数码单反相机吗？

sentences.english: This graduate of Beijing Film Academy owns a bar nearby Houhai.
sentences.chinese: 这个北京电影学院毕业的女孩在后海附近开了个酒吧。

sentences.english: In autumn, the director into the Beijing Film Academy Course learning.
sentences.chinese: 同年秋入北京电影学院导演专修班学习。

sentences.english: Dou now studies acting at the Beijing Film Academy.
sentences.chinese: 目前窦骁在北京电影学院求艺。

sentences.english: The film is the directorial debut of Zhuang Yuxin, vice-professor at the prestigious Beijing Film Academy.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片由庄宇新导演，他是北京电影学院的副教授。
